name: Terry
occupation: self employed and own a export business
description:
I am a very independent, intelligent and outgoing man looking for that special someone…I enjoy doing a variety of things in life and living life to the fullest. I enjoy travelling, romantic encounters, amusement parks, shopping and great conversation. I am a real man who knows what he wants and what he doesn’t. I am too old for games so please bring me no drama.leave me a message
Seeking a woman with a sense of humor, integrity and good values. Someone who enjoys conversation and is in touch with his emotions. I admire ambition and intelligence. Looking for someone who can have a serious side but a playful nature. Easy going and appreciates the value of family and friends is a good thing, too
